summary: While traveling by train, a young socialite is befriended by a charming yet enigmatic older woman. However, when the woman disappears, the other passengers deny she ever existed.
cast: Charles Aitken|Paolo Antonio Simioni|Beatrix Biro|Marta Bolfan|Selina Cadell|Jesper Christensen|Stephanie Cole|Vilmos Cservenák|Zsuzsa David|Emerald Fennell|Balázs Galkó|Daniel Gosling|István Gyurity|Benedikte Hansen|Keeley Hawes|Tom Hughes|Alex Jennings|Gemma Jones|Zsuzsa Kalmar|Gábor Krausz|Lili Lakos|Daisy Lewis|Tamás Lengyel|András Attila Lukács|Sandy McDade|Tuppence Middleton|Csaba Mokany|Balázs Mózes|Julian Rhind-Tutt|Nandor Szilagyi|Csaba Zöld|Pip Torrens|Lysander Barron|Katharine Bubbear|Jack Fayter
title: The Lady Vanishes
